xml.data:
Home » 13S3 Khandhavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 12 Vacchagottasaṃyutta » 12.1 Vacchagottavagga
12.1.16--20 Rūpaananubodhādisuttapañcaka
Vacchagottasaṃyutta
Vacchagottavagga
Rūpaananubodhādisuttapañcaka
622--626.
1254Sāvatthinidānaṃ. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—  ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo…pe…  rūpe kho, vaccha, ananubodhā…pe…  “rūpanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ananubodhā…pe… .
1255Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Vedanāya kho, vaccha…pe… .
1256Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Saññāya kho, vaccha…pe… .
1257Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Saṅkhāresu kho, vaccha…pe… .
1258Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Viññāṇe kho, vaccha, ananubodhā…pe…  viññāṇanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ananubodhā…pe…  vīsatimaṃ.
<< 12.1.11--15 Rūpaanabhisamayādisuttapañcakaup12.1.21--25 Rūpaappaṭivedhādisuttapañcaka >>
